name: Lionessy Story
description: «Lionessy story» is a visual novel that tells a story of a lion cub living out his carefree days in a lion pride reigning over the great African savannah. But life in the wilderness is never easy, and after a terrible tragedy yanks him out of his pampered lifestyle, the young cub has to face the dangers of the real world where anything...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP1 Processor: Pentium 4 1.7 GHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Intel integrated chipset Storage: 400 MB available space
